Title: Services | AidIQ.com
Body:
Our Services

We provide a full range of services to clients to ensure that solutions are implemented effectively and sustainably.

Starter Package

All you need to get your organization started with Sahana Eden:

  • A cloud-hosted Sahana Eden instance including DNS for 1 year
  • Initial setup, including:
    • Modules and menus
    • Master data and static contents
    • Messaging system
  • Basic Customization, including:
    • Localization
    • Homepage, branding and theme
    • Custom forms and reports
    • Authorization policy

Starts at: USD 4000 (EUR 3600)

Back to Top

Custom Solution Development

AidIQ designs, develops and deploys your Sahana Eden solution, made to measure for the needs of your organization or community - at any scale from small prototypes to large multi-year projects:

Price: contact us for an offer

Service & Support

AidIQ provide you with second and third level support for your Sahana Eden solution, including:

  • Email support (48 hours turnaround)
  • Analysis and resolution of defects
  • Minor modifications and improvements
  • Version Upgrades
  • Database Maintenance

Additional services are available upon request.

Price: charged hourly, please contact us for an offer

Back to Top

Technical Training

AidIQ design, develop and facilitate technical trainings for your Sahana Eden project team (including system administrators and developers).

Price: contact us for an offer
